H0.text: In 480 BC, Leonidas led his 300 Spartans against the Persian army, led by Xerxes, in which land battle. Marathon

H1.text: In 480 BC, Leonidas led his 300 Spartans against the Persian army, led by Xerxes, in which land battle. Plataea

H2.text: In 480 BC, Leonidas led his 300 Spartans against the Persian army, led by Xerxes, in which land battle. Salamis

H3.text: In 480 BC, Leonidas led his 300 Spartans against the Persian army, led by Xerxes, in which land battle. Θερμοπύλες

A4.text: The Battle of Thermopylae ( thər-MOP-i-lee) was fought in 480 BC at Thermopylae between the Achaemenid Persian Empire under Xerxes I and an alliance of Greek city-states led by Sparta under Leonidas I.

A5.text: Finally, it moved to attack Athens, landing at the bay of Marathon, where it was met by a heavily outnumbered Athenian army.
